name: Mini Jill Off
description:
Mini Jill Off is a fangame/remake of the indie classic Mighty Jill Off created in puzzlescript.

grab the amazing original here : http://mightyjilloff.dessgeega.com/

Edit : Mini Jill Off was featured in PC Gamer! - http://www.pcgamer.com/the-best-free-games-of-the-...
